insights: Font configuration using Next.js Google Fonts
Robust typing for entities like Organization, Product, User
Enum types for roles and statuses

patterns_discovered: Next.js 14 project structure with app directory
gotchas_discovered: Complex database type definitions might require careful maintenance
Potential performance overhead with extensive type definitions
Need for consistent typing across frontend and backend
recommendations: Use TypeScript's type inference and generics to reduce type definition complexity
Consider implementing automated type generation from Supabase schema
Create documentation for the extensive type system to aid developer understanding
Use eslint and prettier to maintain consistent code formatting
